Attractions Near Marina Glen

Discover Amazing Experiences Within 50km

Explore the best attractions, activities, and experiences on the South Coast of KwaZulu-Natal, all within easy reach of Marina Glen Holiday Resort.

Featured Attractions

Riverbend Crocodile Farm

Riverbend Crocodile Farm

üìç 8km from Marina Glen

Experience South Africa's largest crocodile farm with over 8,000 crocodiles. Watch feeding demonstrations and learn about these incredible reptiles.

Address: Old National Road, Southbroom

Phone: 039 316 6204

Activities: Crocodile viewing, feeding shows, educational tours

Visit Website Call Now
Wild 5 Adventures

Oribi Gorge Wild 5 Adventures

üìç 25km from Marina Glen

Africa's most extreme adventure activities including the world's highest cable gorge swing, zip-lining, and white water rafting.

Address: Oribi Gorge, Izinqolweni, Port Shepstone

Phone: 082 566 7424

Activities: Gorge swing, zip-lining, white water rafting, abseiling

Visit Website WhatsApp
